e0bb421ead241b65c5d8b4acafe5f8247aea8576.commitMessage: Issue #4091: False negative on multiblock tokens with ALONE_OR_SINGLELINE option
e0bb421ead241b65c5d8b4acafe5f8247aea8576.diff:
@@ -1,10 +1,8 @@
     private static boolean shouldBeAloneOnLine(RightCurlyOption bracePolicy, Details details) {
         return bracePolicy == RightCurlyOption.ALONE
-                && !isAloneOnLine(details)
-                && !isEmptyBody(details.lcurly)
+                    && shouldBeAloneOnLineWithAloneOption(details)
                 || bracePolicy == RightCurlyOption.ALONE_OR_SINGLELINE
-                && !isAloneOnLine(details)
-                && !isSingleLineBlock(details)
-                && !isAnonInnerClassInit(details.lcurly)
-                && !isEmptyBody(details.lcurly);
+                    && shouldBeAloneOnLineWithAloneOrSinglelineOption(details)
+                || details.shouldCheckLastRcurly
+                    && details.rcurly.getLineNo() == details.nextToken.getLineNo();
     }
\ No newline at end of file

2551676ccf743822951d42658085c70e7aa869bd.commitMessage:
Revert "Issue #3546: add lambda in a rightcurlycheck"

This reverts commit b0d5b01b3cd174004843fb6fcc91cb971f17f7a2.
2551676ccf743822951d42658085c70e7aa869bd.diff:
@@ -1,15 +1,10 @@
     private static boolean shouldBeAloneOnLine(RightCurlyOption bracePolicy, Details details) {
-        final int tokenLambda = details.lcurly.getParent().getType();
         return bracePolicy == RightCurlyOption.ALONE
-                && tokenLambda != TokenTypes.LAMBDA
                 && !isAloneOnLine(details)
                 && !isEmptyBody(details.lcurly)
                 || bracePolicy == RightCurlyOption.ALONE_OR_SINGLELINE
                 && !isAloneOnLine(details)
                 && !isSingleLineBlock(details)
                 && !isAnonInnerClassInit(details.lcurly)
-                && !isEmptyBody(details.lcurly)
-                || bracePolicy == RightCurlyOption.ALONE
-                && tokenLambda == TokenTypes.LAMBDA
-                && !isAloneLambda(details);
+                && !isEmptyBody(details.lcurly);
     }
\ No newline at end of file

b0d5b01b3cd174004843fb6fcc91cb971f17f7a2.commitMessage: Issue #3546: add lambda in a rightcurlycheck
b0d5b01b3cd174004843fb6fcc91cb971f17f7a2.diff:
@@ -1,10 +1,15 @@
     private static boolean shouldBeAloneOnLine(RightCurlyOption bracePolicy, Details details) {
+        final int tokenLambda = details.lcurly.getParent().getType();
         return bracePolicy == RightCurlyOption.ALONE
+                && tokenLambda != TokenTypes.LAMBDA
                 && !isAloneOnLine(details)
                 && !isEmptyBody(details.lcurly)
                 || bracePolicy == RightCurlyOption.ALONE_OR_SINGLELINE
                 && !isAloneOnLine(details)
                 && !isSingleLineBlock(details)
                 && !isAnonInnerClassInit(details.lcurly)
-                && !isEmptyBody(details.lcurly);
+                && !isEmptyBody(details.lcurly)
+                || bracePolicy == RightCurlyOption.ALONE
+                && tokenLambda == TokenTypes.LAMBDA
+                && !isAloneLambda(details);
     }
\ No newline at end of file
